overview: From 2025-10-08 to 2025-10-09, elizaos/eliza had 2 new PRs (3 merged), 2 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Developer Experience Enhancements
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Provide devtools overlay for debugging Eliza state in-browser.
* Optimize bundle size (tree-shake unused code, check lightweight client).
* Verify hooks integrate with Next.js / Vite.

topIssues.title: Testing & Validation
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Add tests for multi-agent messaging flows, SSE streaming, and recovery scenarios.
* Verify performance improvements and lower complexity for external developers.

topIssues.title: Integration & Migration
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Refactor existing bus code in packages/server to use new class.
* Ensure compatibility with plugins and API endpoints.
* Write developer migration guide for moving off the old bus.

topIssues.title: Modernization
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: Replace Node EventEmitter usage with Bun’s EventTarget.

topIssues.title: Features & Resilience
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Add message filtering by agent, source, and plugin.
* Support message replay/recovery for missed events.
* Add backpressure and rate limiting to prevent floods.
* Expose bus metrics (messages/sec, dropped messages).

topPRs.title: feat(core): add MessageService interface and default implementation
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker

topPRs.title: chore: modernize renovate configuration and add preset for plugins
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

- Chores
  - Added a shared Renovate configuration preset to standardize dependency updates across plugins, with grouped rules for core dependencies, TypeScript, linting, and build tools.
  - Overhauled Renovate setup: switched to recommended base and introduced descriptive groups (React, Testing, Tailwind, Tauri, Drizzle ORM, Radix UI), consolidating internal package handling.
  - Increased update cadence and PR limits (daily schedule, higher caps), enabled a dependency dashboard with semantic commit settings; automerge remains disabled.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: fix(service-interfaces): skip test execution for types-only package
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
The @elizaos/service-interfaces package contains only TypeScript interface
definitions and has no runtime logic or tests. The test script was failing
when running `bun run test` from the project root because bun test exits
with code 1 when no test files are found.

Changed the test scripts to explicitly skip test execution with a clear
message, allowing the monorepo test suite to complete successfully.

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Replace `packages/service-interfaces` test scripts with no-op commands that skip tests and exit 0.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 2c02661e40cbd07868c90f7844c09045cf7beb9e. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
